oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Habits of the Bat and the Porcupine, etc. By Dia!kwain, from his parents (L V.-6. 4378-4403). What Dia!kwain's parents told him about the bat and the porcupine who inhabit the same hole and go about together seeking food.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A belief about the bat and the porcupine
